message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more reasonable price. My counteroffer is $900,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  To find a mutually agreeable outcome, I'm proposing a price of $950,000. This reflects the true value of the product.
I understand Alice's position, but I would like to stick to my original idea. My counteroffer remains at $900,000.
